text: Ta dekret dlya righteousness nas u tsʹomu sviti, ta u U maybutnʹomu. My kayalysya do Vas." Vin skazav, "Miy retribution befalls whomever ya budu. Ale Moye myloserdya okhoplyuye vsi rechi.
